revised_title: Sex Chromosome Influence on Germ Cell Proliferation and Spermatogenesis
tldr: The authors discuss the influence of sex chromosomes on germ cell proliferation and spermatogenesis in mammals. They present evidence of differential behavior of germ cells with different sex chromosome constitutions and the impact of reciprocal translocations on spermatogenesis. The findings suggest that a significant part of the genetic information in the diploid genome is involved in the process of spermatogenesis.
